remarks: Introducing a term on the left-hand side of a sum in a negated equality.  Contrapositive of ~ addcanad .  Consequence of ~ addcand . (Contributed by David Moews, 28-Feb-2017.)
statement:
muld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
addcomd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
addcand.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
addneintrd.4 $e |- ( ph -> B =/= C ) $.
addneintrd $p |- ( ph -> ( A + B ) =/= ( A + C ) ) $.
